issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When you run "ti clean", it doesn't properly clean all the build directories. If you specify a specific platform to clean (i.e. "ti clean -p iphone"), then it works as expected.
fields.summary: CLI: ti clean command doesn't work if build dir contains a .DS_Store file

comments.body:
Timob master pull request: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/4104
Timob 3.1.x pull request: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/4105

it works as expected, hence closing the issue.

Verified on:
SDK: 3.1.0.GA
CLI version : 3.1.0-cr
OS : MAC OSX 10.7.5
Titanium Studio, build: 3.1.0.201304151600
XCode : 4.5.1
